email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope you're doing well. We have the MV OCEAN STAR (DWT: 150,000, LOA: 300m) available for a coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The cargo size is 120,000MT on CIF terms. The starting freight quote is USD 25.50 per ton. Laycan is 1-5 Dec. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria Santos

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thanks for the quote. USD 25.50 seems a bit high. Can you do better? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I can offer USD 24.75 per ton. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Maria Santos

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

USD 24.75 is better. Can we push it to USD 24.50? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 2-6 Dec?

Best,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

USD 24.50 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 2-6 Dec. Please confirm.

Best,
Maria Santos

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN STAR
- Cargo: 120,000MT Coal
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Laycan: 2-6 Dec
- Freight: USD 24.50 per ton
- Demurrage: USD 15,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best,
Maria Santos
